ResponseTimeout

Response timeout for operations (DEPRECATED)

[Obsolete("ResponseTimeout is obsolete in StackExchange.Redis 2.7+ and has no effect. Use SyncTimeout and AsyncTimeout instead.")]
public TimeSpan ResponseTimeout { get; set; }

Property Value

TimeSpan

Remarks

This property is deprecated in StackExchange.Redis 2.7+ and has no effect. It will be removed in a future version to align with StackExchange.Redis 3.0. Use SyncTimeout and AsyncTimeout instead for controlling operation timeouts.
